rule.name: AS_FS_BL_constructProduct
rule.description: Rule to construct Product for a customer
rule.definition: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Product', value: { productId: null, customerId: ri!customerId, accounts: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!product.accounts), null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!product.accounts, expression: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Account', value: { accountId: null, name: fv!item.name, type: fv!item.type, accountNumber: fv!item.accountNumber, isDeleted: fv!item.isDeleted } ) ) ), name: ri!product.name, productTypeCode: ri!product.productTypeCode, description: ri!product.description, entity: ri!product.entity, entityType: ri!product.entityType, strategy: ri!product.strategy, value: ri!product.value, valueCurrencyCode: ri!product.valueCurrencyCode, duration: ri!product.duration, upfrontFee: ri!product.upfrontFee, commitmentFee: ri!product.commitmentFee, interest: ri!product.interest, coverRequired: ri!product.coverRequired, collateral: ri!product.collateral, collateralValue: ri!product.collateralValue, collateralCurrencyCode: ri!product.collateralCurrencyCode, coverProvided: ri!product.coverProvided, createdBy: ri!product.createdBy, createdDatetime: ri!product.createdDatetime, modifiedBy: ri!product.modifiedBy, modifiedDatetime: ri!product.modifiedDatetime, isParent: ri!product.isParent, isDeleted: ri!product.isDeleted, term: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!product.term), null, #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Term', value: { termId: null, performanceStartDate: ri!product.term.performanceStartDate, performanceReturnTerm: ri!product.term., committedMargin: ri!product.term., rateLock: ri!product.term.rateLock, shortLock: ri!product.term.shortLock, otherTerm: ri!product.term.otherTerm, isDeleted: ri!product.term.isDeleted } ) ), countries: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!product.countries), null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!product.countries, expression: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Country', value: { countryId: null, countryCode: fv!item.countryCode, isTradingAllowed: fv!item.isTradingAllowed, isDeleted: fv!item.isDeleted } ) ) ), fees: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!product.fees), null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!product.fees, expression: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Fee', value: { feeId: null, fee: fv!item.fee, type: fv!item.type, adValorem: fv!item.adValorem, transactionCharge: fv!item.transactionCharge, transactionCurrencyCode: fv!item.transactionCurrencyCode, feeCurrencyCode: fv!item.feeCurrencyCode, country: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(fv!item.country), null, #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_Country', value: { countryId: null, countryCode: fv!item.country.countryCode, isTradingAllowed: fv!item.country.isTradingAllowed, isDeleted: fv!item.country.isDeleted } ) ) } ) ) ), thresholds: if( #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_73536"(ri!product.thresholds), null, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!product.thresholds, expression: #"_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_157603"( type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:FS}AS_FS_PayThreshold', value: { payThresholdId: null, operator: fv!item.operator, threshold: fv!item.threshold, thresholdCurrencyCode: fv!item.thresholdCurrencyCode, authorizations: fv!item.authorizations } ) ) ) } )
